details.script_description: This script launches a Dask cluster on a SLURM cluster using SSH to connect to the nodes. It runs a python script named 'losing_workers-loop.py' on the Dask cluster.
script_functionality: Launches a Dask scheduler on the first node
Launches Dask workers on all nodes
Executes the python script 'losing_workers-loop.py' on the Dask cluster
